# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Head of Personnel
The Head of Personnel is Second-in-Command (2IC), but is also the head of the Service departments. They're also responsible for managing staffing. HoP can either be the most boring job or the most stressful job.
## Do - Ensure the station is running smoothly. - Ensure the Service departments are running smoothly. - Process job change requests and ensure departments are properly staffed. - Be prepared to take on Captain's duties in the event the Captain is incapacitated or missing. - (Optional) Manage and process paperwork related to staffing. - Protect Ian, the MVP on the station.
